item.title: 3kCTF 2020 Writeup
item.description: pyzzle1 Problem A puzzle be a game, problem, or toy dat tests a personz ingenuity or knowledge. In a puzzle, tha solver is sposed ta fuckin put pieces together up in a logical way, up in order ta arrive all up in tha erect or funk solution of tha puzzle. challenge 2nd flag : change it from 3K-text to 3k{text} Solution By taking a look at the file and searching up some of the key terms like SimpleStatementLine, we quickly realize that the given file is a LibCST concrete syntax tree.
